nodes.excerpt: Re:AMP is a fast, flexible, high-fidelity music player for macOS X, fully written in Swift. Re:Amp supports a lot of audio formats, custom interfaces called skins from classic Winamp. Re:Amp is freeware.
nodes.title: re:AMP - Audio player for Mac with Winamp classic skins support
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: A mix of real & GPT3 generated quotes based on the 2000-year-old stoic philosophy. Try guess which ones are real & which are generated.
nodes.title: Stoic.today - A game to guess if Stoic quotes are real or GPT3 generated
nodes.author: Simon Coulter

nodes.title:
Tomorrow the Fed tell you there are no signs of inflation anywhere, that they must continue their easy money policies (0% rates & $120 billion/month in bond buying) in order to bring about - get this - higher inflation. And no one will question any of it.

https://t.co/7EhmR89A3h https://t.co/DLeDUpyRqo

nodes.excerpt: Product Makers is a Slack group to help grow your network. You can share your ideas, ask for feedbacks, explore new informations and communicate with other entrepreneurs who can help you to grow.

nodes.excerpt: Import all of your domains for auto-generated landing pages in a matter of minutes. Use 1-click domain forwarding to start capturing more leads, backed by a robust sales & management dashboard.
nodes.title: DomainPage - A dashboard for managing your domains

nodes.title: PrinciplesYou - Gain better self-awareness about your personality

nodes.excerpt: Something better than "like a local". No tours, no guides, no crowds, no spam, no COVID-19. A special travel app for sharing off the beaten, hardcore and mostly free places to visit with like-minded people.
nodes.title: FREEKIN' - Social network and marketplace for non-touristy places
nodes.author: Ekaterina Lysykh
